Description: Fender Mark Knopfler “Artist series” Stratocaster Greetings and thanks for your interest in this listing for an Outstanding, Authentic, very hot, Fender Mark Knopfler Stratocaster electric guitar Please, click HERE and see 34 HD photos of this gem. All original – basically UNPLAYED – Knopfler Strat that proudly shows the distinctive sparkling, beautiful, Hot Rod Red nitro lacquer finish (815 Fender)!!! This Knopfler Strat is in almost IMMACULATE condition: still has the original protective film on both pickguard and trem cover. Very low fretwear (estimated 10 max 20%). I had two Knop Strats in my private collection; 10 months ago I sold one for 3.2K (you can read it - please, check my feedback)... This is the last one I got, and this is a beauty! Production year: 2008 · Model Name - Mark Knopfler Stratocaster · Model Number - 011-7800-815 · Series - Artist Series · Color - Hot Rod Red (nitro-cellulose lacquer finish) · Body - Comfort contoured '57 lightweight ash body · Neck - Vintage tinted '62 maple neck, "C" shape (nitrocellulose lacquer finish) · Fingerboard - Rosewood (7.25" radius) · No. of Frets - 21 Medium Jumbo nickel silver frets · Pickups - 3 Texas Special single-coil strat pickups · Controls - Master Volume, Tone 1 (neck pickup), Tone 2 (middle pickup) · Pickup Switching - 5-Position Blade · Bridge - American Vintage Synchronized Tremolo · Machine heads - Fender/Gotoh Vintage Style tuning machines · Hardware - Chrome · Pickguard - 3-ply, 11-hole, Mint Green · Scale length - 25.5" · Width at nut - 1.625" · Unique Features - Dot inlays, transitional decal, Mark Knopfler signature on ball of headstock · Case - Deluxe black hardshell case 34 HD photos, please check them all out. Guitar comes with its original HSC and ALL CASE CANDY, as pictured. I am an honest seller with extensive knowledge of guitars. I am a super-collector and I also have 30 years of playing experience. I’m knowledgeable of what I’m selling and I’ve made every effort to represent this item accurately. I am confident that the future owner will not be disappointed.
